00003  class jBar{
00004 
00005   int MAXHEIGHT; //pixels
00006   int MAXWIDTH;  //pixels
00007   int ORIGINLOC_X,ORIGINLOC_Y; //x,y
00008   int STEPSIZE;  //step size
00009   int MIDPOINT;
00010   int MAXITERATIONS;
00011   int LARGESTVALUE;
00012   ArrayList data = new ArrayList();
00013   int [] textcolor = {100,100,100};
00014 
00015 
00016   jBar(){
00017     MAXHEIGHT = 255; 
00018     MAXWIDTH =  50;
00019     ORIGINLOC_X = 100;
00020     ORIGINLOC_Y = 700;
00021     MIDPOINT = MAXHEIGHT/2;
00022     LARGESTVALUE = 1024;
00023     font = loadFont("SegoeCondensed-Bold-48.vlw");
00024   }
00025   
00026    jBar( int originX, int originY, int maxheight, int maxwidth, int largestvalue) {
00027    MAXHEIGHT = maxheight; 
00028    MAXWIDTH =  maxwidth;
00029    ORIGINLOC_X = originX;
00030    ORIGINLOC_Y = originY;
00031    MIDPOINT = MAXHEIGHT/2;
00032    LARGESTVALUE = largestvalue;
00033    
00034 
00035  }
00036  
00037   void drawBar( ArrayList inputdata){  
00038     //lets draw the axis first
00039     //data = inputdata;
00040     
00041     //background(#ffffff);
00042     //dataTrunc(inputdata);
00043     textFont(font, 25); 
00044     data = inputdata;
00045     if (data.size() > 0 )
00046       drawData();
00047     //else 
00048       //println("Data set is too small");
00049       
00050       drawMidPoint();
00051     
00052  }
00053  
00054  void drawMidPoint(){
00055   stroke(#ff0000);
00056   line(ORIGINLOC_X,ORIGINLOC_Y-MIDPOINT, ORIGINLOC_X+MAXWIDTH, ORIGINLOC_Y-MIDPOINT);
00057   
00058   textAlign(RIGHT);
00059   fill(textcolor[0],textcolor[1],textcolor[2]);
00060   //text(LARGESTVALUE/2,ORIGINLOC_X,ORIGINLOC_Y-MIDPOINT); 
00061   
00062  } 
00063   
00064    
00065  void drawData(){
00066    
00067    int listSize =0;
00068    int value = 0;
00069    //println("Drawing");
00070 
00071       listSize = data.size()-1;
00072       value = checkBoundary((Integer)data.get(listSize));
00073 
00074    float pt = float(MAXHEIGHT)/float(LARGESTVALUE) * float(value);
00075   
00076   /*draw box*/
00077    fill(#ffffff);
00078    stroke(#000000);
00079    textAlign(LEFT);
00080    rect(ORIGINLOC_X,ORIGINLOC_Y, MAXWIDTH+1, (-1)*MAXHEIGHT);
00081 //   text(LARGESTVALUE,ORIGINLOC_X,ORIGINLOC_Y-MAXHEIGHT);  //tells u the midpoint
00082    
00083    /*draw bar*/
00084    fill(value%1024, 0, 255- value%256);
00085    textAlign(CENTER);
00086    text(value,ORIGINLOC_X+MAXWIDTH/2,ORIGINLOC_Y-MAXHEIGHT); //tells you its current data
00087    rect(ORIGINLOC_X,ORIGINLOC_Y, MAXWIDTH, (-1)* int(pt));
00088        
00089  }
00090  
00091  int checkBoundary(int value){
00092   if (value > LARGESTVALUE)
00093    return LARGESTVALUE;
00094   else if (value <=0)
00095    return 0;
00096   else 
00097    return value; 
00098  }
00099 
00100 }
